texto: 7.5.2 Benefits Process capability analysis enables the organization to estimate the level of nonconformity and the associated costs, and can help guide decisions regarding correction, process improvement and resource allocation. Setting minimum standards for process capability can guide the organization in selecting processes and equipment that reduce the risk of producing unacceptable products and services. Machine performance analysis is used to assess the ability of a machine to produce or perform to stated requirements. This is helpful in making purchase or repair decisions.
